characters.name: Rick Sanchez
characters.comment: Universe Worst man but is he really?!?!?!

characters.name: Morty Smith
characters.comment: Morty hey Morty, want to take over the world? not really but OK!

characters.name: Summer Smith
characters.comment: I'm a scientist, because I invent, transform, create, and destroy for a living, and when I don't like something about the world, I change it.

characters.name: NOOB NOOB
characters.comment: Noob-Noob appears to be ready to graduate to a full Vindicator, but is forced to remain behind after Rick gets drunk, passes out, and defecates all over the ship's holo-table
